tool_description: Creates detailed assembly sequences and construction plans for textile projects, organizing work order and technique requirements.

project_type.description: Type of project (sweater, cardigan, blanket, shawl, hat, mittens, socks, scarf)

construction_method.description: Primary construction approach (top-down, bottom-up, seamed, seamless, modular, flat)

error_messages: Unsupported project type: Use one of [sweater, cardigan, blanket, shawl, hat, mittens, socks, scarf].
Invalid construction method: Use one of [top-down, bottom-up, seamed, seamless, modular, flat].
Invalid skill level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced].
Invalid time constraint: Use one of [quick, moderate, leisurely].
usage: Specify project_type, construction_method, and skill_level to generate a complete construction plan. Add special_techniques array and time_constraint for customized planning.

technique_requirements.description: List of techniques needed for the project
